channel.title: Open Source on CamMakoJ
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on CamMakoJ

item.title: GeoServer Fun
item.description: I got this big idea in my head that I wanted to make it easier for co-workers to access the treasure trove of GIS data I have been collecting. Mostly just standard public datasets, but it’s nice to be able to pull them into your GIS Environment and view them along with the other layers your looking at. Originally I had setup a bunch of geopackages on dropbox to organize and share the datasets, however this required each user to download a local copy of the data and wasn’t terribly efficient.
